articles.title: Knife attack on French police officer - Reuters
articles.description: One man has been shot and wounded after carrying out a knife attack on a police officer in the French city of Cannes. The policeman escaped serious injury thanks to his bullet-proof jacket
articles.content:
Posted 
One man has been shot and wounded after carrying out a knife attack on a police officer in the French city of Cannes. The policeman escaped serious injury thanks to his bullet-proof jacket
